title: BrightData Web Fetcher
description: Search Google or fetch web content using BrightData APIs. Use `gl` for country and `hl` for language. Supports up to 15 parallel search queries with intelligent expansion (10 results each) or up to 150 URLs per request.

userSettings.name: serpApiKey
userSettings.label: BrightData SERP API Key
userSettings.description: Your BrightData API key for Google search requests.

userSettings.name: serpZone
userSettings.label: SERP Zone ID
userSettings.description: BrightData zone identifier for SERP API requests. Leave default unless using a custom zone.

userSettings.name: unlockerApiKey
userSettings.label: BrightData Web Unlocker API Key
userSettings.description: Your BrightData API key for bypassing website protections when fetching webpages. Required for content extraction.

userSettings.name: unlockerZone
userSettings.label: Web Unlocker Zone ID
userSettings.description: BrightData zone identifier for Web Unlocker API requests. Leave default unless using a custom zone.

userSettings.name: openaiApiKey
userSettings.label: OpenAI API Key
userSettings.description: Your OpenAI API key for content extraction and content cleaning via AI.

openaiSpec.name: brightdata_web_fetcher
openaiSpec.description: Search Google (SERP API with intelligent query expansion, use gl/country and hl/language for localization; supports up to 15 search queries with 10 results each) or fetch content from up to 150 URLs in parallel (Web Unlocker API). Extracts content with AI processing for HTML files.

action.description: 'search': Google search with intelligent expansion (SERP API, max 15 queries); 'fetch': web/page fetch (Web Unlocker API, max 150 URLs)

query.description: Search query or array of queries (max 15 total including AI expansions, required when action is 'search'). AI will automatically expand with related queries.

context_question.description: The original user question or context to focus content extraction on relevant information only. Helps reduce token usage by filtering irrelevant content.

tbm.description: Google search type: 'nws' for news, 'shop' for shopping.

gl.description: Google 'gl' parameter: country code for localization. Choose from Google's supported gl values. AI will auto-detect if not specified.

hl.description: Google 'hl' parameter: interface language code. Choose from Google's supported hl values. AI will auto-detect if not specified.

start.description: Pagination result offset. 0 (default), 20 for second page, 40 for third, etc.

num.description: Number of results to return per query. Default is 10.

url.description: Single URL or array of URLs (max 150) to fetch with Web Unlocker. Supports HTML/JSON/XML/JavaScript/CSS/text. HTML content is processed with AI.
